resources.string: Reroute location requests to the OS
Location permission needs to be set to “%s“.
"Google’s location service is disabled. Tap “%1$s“ to learn more. If you decide to keep it disabled, consider enabling “%2$s“ option to improve app compatibility."
Revoke the Location permission from Play services.
Location access is off for all apps.
"Location requests are rerouted to the OS, but Play services still has the Location permission."
"Play services needs Location permission to be set to “%s“, and “Use precise location“ needs to be enabled."
"Location service assisted by Bluetooth scanning requires the “Nearby devices“ permission."
Always-on Wi-Fi scanning is enabled, but not allowed (no Location permission).
Always-on Bluetooth scanning is enabled, but not allowed (no “Nearby devices“ permission).
"When device is idle, push notifications will be delayed to improve battery life. To receive them quicker, set “Battery usage“ to “Unrestricted“ in Play services app info."
Play Store needs the “Files and media“ permission to install this app
"Play services needs the “Nearby devices“ permission to enable Exposure Notifications"
This game needs the Play Games app
%s needs to show a screen. Tap to allow
